Messages.Author: Max Klimm
Messages.Content: Dear participants, due to talk cancellations, some minor updates to the seminar schedule were necessary. Please check the ISIS page. Best Max Klimm

Messages.Author: Max Klimm
Messages.Content: Dear participants, I had to make some small adjustments to the talk times next week. Please have a look and inform me as quickly as possible if you cannot make it to your time slot. Concerning the written summary. It is not mandatory, to hand in a written summary. If you want to hand in a written summary, please do that before you give the talk so that I can have a look at the summary during your talk. Best regards Max Klimm

Messages.Author: Max Klimm
Messages.Content: Dear participants, I just published the talk schedules for next week. As said earlier, all talks are expected to last for 30min. I planned for 5min break between talks in order for the next speaker to set up and for questions. Please have a look at the schedule and let me know as quickly as possible in case you cannot make it to the slot where your talk is supposed to take place. I expect to obtain all slides from you by this Friday (June 28, 2024) at 23:59. Best regards Max Klimm

Messages.Author: Max Klimm
Messages.Content: Dear participants, I will not be at MA 751 tomorrow (23.5.2024) from 12:15-13:45. If you have any questions, please write them by email. Best regards Max Klimm

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Selection of participants and seminar topics

Messages.Author: Max Klimm
Messages.Content: Dear participants, I selected the participants in the course. You can find the names of the participants on the ISIS page. I am sorry that I could not accomodate all of you in the seminar. I also opened the selection form for the seminar topics. Please select the topics that you favour. The poll will close this Friday and I will assign the topics afterwards. The assignment is not on a first-come-first-serve-basis, so can take your time to make an informed decision. Best, Max Klimm
